newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan bank auctions 6.9bln rupees bonds, repos.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan bank auctions 6.9bln rupees bonds, repos.

text.p: The State (central) Bank of Pakistan auctioned short-term federal bonds and five-month repos worth a total of 6.9 billion rupees in an open market operation on Wednesday, a bank statement said.
It said bids worth 2.9 billion rupees were submitted for the six-month bonds and all of them were accepted at a maximum cut-off rate of 13.25 percent a year.
Bids worth 4.0 billion were received for the repos and all were accepted at a maximum cut-off of 13 percent a year.
